subject: PGA Championship
Golf
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Keegan Bradley, the P.G.A. Championship winner, and other Red Storm golfers have honed their skills in a nontraditional way, practicing at a dozen New York City area courses.
snippet: Keegan Bradley, the P.G.A. Championship winner, and other Red Storm golfers have honed their skills in a nontraditional way, practicing at a dozen New York City area courses.
